task: Develop a basic 'Ghouls 'n Ghosts' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Be dirty'.
name: Grime and Ghosts

branding_data.short_description: Grime and Ghosts: A gritty twist on the classic action platformer.
branding_data.detailed_description: Grime and Ghosts is a reimagined version of the classic 'Ghouls 'n Ghosts' game, infusing it with a raw and gritty atmosphere. Players take on the role of a rugged knight navigating through grimy, haunted landscapes filled with dirt, decay, and supernatural foes. The game's unique 'Be dirty' strategy adds layers of environmental grime and challenging terrain, forcing players to adapt to slippery surfaces and obscured visibility. Master your combat skills and traverse through the muck to defeat ghostly enemies and unearth hidden secrets in this dark, thrilling adventure.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
strategy: game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy:
